Package utilitaries

Class MealyMachine

java.lang.Object
utilitaries.MealyMachine
public class MealyMachine extends Object
A Mealy state machine that will read through a state machine and execute outputs in its transitions
Author:
nickyecen,

    • MealyMachine

      public MealyMachine(String initialState, HashMap<String,HashMap<Character,Tuple<String,Command>>> stateMap)
      Constructs the Mealy state machine for execution
      Parameters:
      initialState - the state in which the machine will start execution
      stateMap - the state map that the machine will go through to execute
